summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Beast Blue Beard Oil with Organic Argan & Jojoba Oils, 1 fl oz Review Date: 2020/01/31 Store: Tame the Beast Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Liquid Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Tame the Beast', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 FL OZ', 'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 3.54 x 1.54 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '817662018546'} Review Text: Out of all the beard oils the husband has used he says this one is the best. Its lightweight, moisturizing and the scent (which is excellent on its own) doesn't linger too long. I've tried other products from this line and they've all been great! Review Title: 5/5 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 4 Pieces Glass Nail Shiner Crystal Nail Shine Buffer Polisher Crystal Glass Nano Nail File with Case for Natural Nails (Black Flat End) Review Date: 2020/03/06 Store: Mudder Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Material': 'Glass', 'Brand': 'Mudder', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 1.57 x 0.63 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} Review Text: I don't understand the good reviews. This didn't work for me. It was uncomfortable to use and didn't do a good job. I feel like it did more damage than good. There's scratches on my nails, even if you use a lighter hand you don't see any results. Review Title: Not for me. Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Winky Lux Double Matte Whip 24-Hour Waterproof Lipstick, Liquid Wet Lipstick for Long-Lasting Matte Lip Color, Hydrating Makeup with Vanilla and Avocado Oil to Lock in Moisture, 0.14 Oz, Cookie Review Date: 2020/07/07 Store: Winky Lux Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Winky Lux', 'Color': 'Cookie', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.65 x 0.65 x 4.28 inches; 0.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '859346006968'} Review Text: If you have dry lips and you'd like still like to find a liquid lipstick that doesn't crack on your lips I'm afraid this isn't it. It dries out very quickly and it settles in my lines.
The shade of it is nice, I can imagine it looking beautiful on someone with deeper skin tone, I have brown skin but on me it looks unflattering. It does have a soft, non irritating scent which I like. Review Title: Not for me unfortunately! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Foot Peel Mask For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin & Calluses - Make Your Feet Baby Soft & Get a Smooth Skin, Removes & Repairs Rough Heels Review Date: 2020/09/05 Store: Monikahair Average Rating: 2.9 Product Details: {'UPC': '739515020639'} Review Text: This does work but you gotta follow the instructions properly! It wont show any results immediately but over time I saw lots of dead skin shedding which was gross but also satisfying. Review Title: It works! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 35.4 Inch Extra Long Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower, 2021 Updated Lengthen Back Scrubber Brush for Men and Women, Exfoliating Back Washer with Wall Hooks, Easy Clean, Comfortable Massage (Green 27.5in) Review Date: 2020/09/20 Store: MAORULU Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.75 x 5.5 x 2.6 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '757173533773', 'Manufacturer': 'MAORULU'} Review Text: I don't think this is doing anything. I've used it a couple times and doesn't feel like its doing its job. The bristles are way too soft. If you are itchy and can't reach your back then its great. But I wouldn't get this using it would clean my back. Review Title: Too mild. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Travel Bottles for Toiletries, Silicone Travel Size Bottles And Squeezable Containers Holders with belt clip Keychain for Backpack, Shampoo, Liquid, Cosmetic Products(2 oz, 6 Pack) Review Date: 2020/12/15 Store: MACRAY Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MACRAY', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 6.61 x 1.61 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '782938308006'} Review Text: I got these to throw in my hospital bag. They are good quality, do the job very well. I have not travelled anywhere with these so I am not sure if they leak while flying but I would still throw them in a ziploc to be on the safe side. They are silicone so its super easy to squeeze.
Overall its a great travelling essential. Review Title: Does the job. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spanature Olive Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection, 4 Pack, Revitalizing Moisturizer for Rough and Dry Skin, Nourishing and Gentle for All Skin Types, Made In Korea - 75 ml/2.53oz Review Date: 2021/04/26 Store: Spanature Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Spanature', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Use for': 'Hands', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.89 x 1.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} Review Text: I have extremely dry hands. And they have become drier after baby#2. I started using this and I'm liking how it performs. Its lightweight, non greasy and absorbs well. Nice soft scent. I think its really good value because there's 4 of them. Great to have them in the car/purse/desk etc. Review Title: So far so good. Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- Format your response exactly as follows: POSITIVE SUMMARY: [Your positive summary here] NEGATIVE SUMMARY: [Your negative summary here] OVERALL SUMMARY: [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has expressed high satisfaction with several products, particularly appreciating lightweight and non-greasy items. They highlighted effective moisturizing properties in grooming and skincare, finding certain beauty products to be impressive in performance. The scent of products has also been positively noted without being overpowering. The user values products that deliver good results, as shown with the successful performance of the lotion and travel bottles, which they found practical for their purposes.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Conversely, the user encountered multiple disappointments, primarily with products that underperformed or caused discomfort. They specifically mentioned dissatisfaction with the nail buffer, feeling it was damaging rather than helpful. Additionally, certain skincare products did not meet expectations, with issues involving dryness or inefficacy in their claimed benefits. Some items were described as too mild or ineffective for their intended purpose, leading to frustration.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping behavior reveals a blend of positive and negative experiences. On the positive side, they found several effective and pleasant products, noting great moisturizing qualities and practical designs. However, they also faced challenges with items that did not perform as expected, leading to frustrations about their usability and results. This mix highlights the importance of seeking quality and performance in products while emphasizing the need for clear communication of effectiveness.

target_interaction.title: Too strong for me.
target_interaction.text:
I am not very picky about my hand soap, most of them do the same job. This does as well. It lathers nicely and washes well without leaving a greasy feeling.
But unfortunately for me, the scent is too strong and makes me kinda nauseous. This might not be a bigger problem for others but it is for me.
And I don't mean to sound ignorant, but what is Novid-19 series? They don't really explain that. Does it mean No-Covid? Is there something I'm missing? Seems to me like some made up B.S. that would attract the customer to buy a $20 bottle of hand soap.
Sorry guys. In all honesty, I cannot recommend this.
target_interaction.title_meta: Stay Safe Hand Wash, Hand Soap with Lavender Oil and Tea Tree Oil for Skin, Essential Oil Hand Soap Dispenser, 12 fl oz
